headline: Trade war: 'The Americans are the ones paying for the tariffs'
subhead: Gilles Moëc, chief economist at AXA, argues that while tariffs take time to affect the real economy, they are likely to have recessionary effects in both the US and Europe.

headline: Three erotic experiences inspired by boredom
subhead: Maïa Mazaurette is on a mission to spice up your steamy summer nights. This week, she suggests doing absolutely nothing – except letting your thoughts wander, caressing yourself for a long time and questioning your certainties.

headline: Nevado del Ruiz, the explosive titan of the Andes
subhead: 'Of Volcanoes and Men' (2/6). French photographer Marguerite Bornhauser ventured onto the Colombian volcano, at an altitude of over 5,000 meters, in the summer of 2024. She captured the strangeness of its sculpted landscapes, using colored filters to highlight the fiery nature of our planet.

headline: Jean-Luc Brendel, a 'geek' of plant-based cuisine
